original: Bergman, Sven Helge, civilingenjör, Karlshamn, f. 6/3/88 i Are, Jämtl. L, av baning. Sigfrid B. o. Georgina Rö-dén. G. 1. 16 m. Inga Björkman, d. 22; 2. 25 m. Greta Lundh. Barn: Gunnar f. 17, Marianne (adoptidtr) 23, Britta 26, Kerstin 28, Ragnar 30. — Studiex. i Norrköp. 06, avg:ex. fr. KTH (E) 09. Drift- o. distrib :ing. v. Hemsjö Kraft A-B 10-16, ing. v. Public Service Co. of Northern Illinois, Chicago, 16-17, anst. v. Burroughs Ad-ding Machine Co. i Detroit 17-19, chef f. kraftförsäljn :avd. v. Hemsjö Kraft A-B 19-20 o. v. Sydsv. Kraft A-B 20-24, övering. o. chef f. kraftkontrollen i Malmö 24-34, egen konsult, verk-samh. i Karlshamn sed. 34. Led. av elektrif :komm:r i Malmöh. 1. 25-26 o. 29-34, led. av stadsfullm., elverksstyr. o. folksk :s’tyr. i Karlshamn. Led. av Sv. tekn.-fören. sed. 08.
translated: Bergman, Sven Helge, engineer, Karlshamn, b. March 6, 1888 in Are, Jämtland County. Son of Sigfrid B. and Georgina Rö-dén. Married 1st to Inga Björkman in 1916, she died in 1922; 2nd to Greta Lundh in 1925. Children: Gunnar b. 1917, Marianne (adopted daughter) b. 1923, Britta b. 1926, Kerstin b. 1928, Ragnar b. 1930. He passed his final high school exam in Norrköping in 1906, and his engineering degree from KTH (E) in 1909. He worked in operations and distribution at Hemsjö Kraft A-B from 1910 to 1916, as an engineer at Public Service Co. of Northern Illinois in Chicago from 1916 to 1917, as the head of the power sales department at Hemsjö Kraft AB from 1919 to 1920, and at Sydsv. Kraft A-B from 1920 to 1924. He was the superintendent and head of power control in Malmö from 1924 to 1934, a self-employed consultant with his own business in Karlshamn since 1934. He was a member of the electrical communication committee in Malmö from 1925-1926 and 1929-1934, a member of the city council, power plant board and public school board in Karlshamn. He was also a member of the Swedish Engineering Association since 1908.

memberOfLocal.name: Stadsfullm., Elverksstyr. o. Folksk :s’tyr. i Karlshamn

employer.name: Public Service Co. of Northern Illinois
